com.erudika.para.core

Class Thing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erudika.para.core.Sysprop
      • com.erudika.para.core.Thing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Linkable, ParaObject, Votable, Serializable

    public class Thing
extends Sysprop
    A "thing" in the Internet of Things. Generic IoT object for describing a device in the cloud.
    Author:
    Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
